reviews.review: Замечательная игрушка, один минус много багов ( Ага, конечно один минус.. ). А так игрушка замечательная, я её лафф <3

Momentan ist es echt schlimm. Man sitzt teilweise mit 4 Freunden 30 Minuten um eine Lobby zu finden...
Außerdem ist es schrecklich, wenn die Internetverbindung vom Killer schrecklich ist, dann laggen alle.

Ein tolles Spiel, aber momentan nicht spielbar...

Das Spiel ist mega Klasse. Macht höllisch viel Spaß.
Es ist zwar noch ein wenig verbuggt, besonders eine Lobby zu finden und wenn er kein gefunden hat dann steht da Spielbeitritt misslungen und sehr oft hängt sich das Game auf.
Das nervt tierisch weil man immer das Spiel über den Task-Manager schließen muss und es neu starten muss.
Hoffe das sie diesen großen Bug bald fixen, dann wäre das Spiel einen großen Schritt weiter.

Aber sonst Daumen nach oben :)
norm igra

《黎明杀机》有中文，并且没有什么翻译上的错误，这点我是肯定要给好评的，在游戏内容上也很刺激，当幸存者的时候到处跑（但是玩了半天之后我发现我还是适合当杀手）寻找可以翻越的掩体和障碍物，柜子基本上没什么用，因为进柜子的声音太大了，很容易被听见，我是不会再玩幸存者了，我喜欢杀手并且每次都能赢，我玩了六局只有一局是没有全部杀死，剩下五局我把四个幸存者统统杀了，那酸爽不敢相信！画质也就那样吧，说好不好说差不差，远的看是不错的，就是不能在意细节。《黎明杀机》绝对是好游戏，就是优化可能有点差，可能，很适合那些喜欢东躲西藏的玩家，喜欢刺激的也能来玩玩，甚至还能和好友一起互相伤害！友谊的小船说翻就翻啊。缺点就是匹配有点慢。

刚开始 跟朋友一起买的杀机 当时不会玩 进去就死了就是所谓的萌新 后面 慢慢看别人怎么遛屠夫 自己现在玩了391小时成了人皇 找到了这游戏的快感 屠夫追你 但砍不到你的感觉  ！！！现在这个游戏首先 读进度 特别慢 绿条读完 又重新读 进了 游戏还会卡房间  最恶心的是 这个游戏重心是偏向屠夫的 屠夫本来就很强 现在还可以卡人类的技能携手和心灵 屠夫直接透视 相当于开挂 举报了也没有用发邮件给官方 官方不管！ 现在屠夫十个有八个卡人类的技能 真的伤了很多玩家的心 现在要买这个游戏的 真的慎重你玩人类 进去呆不了 多久就死了 进游戏20分钟 等加入房间开始游戏10分钟 进去玩3分钟 就死了 BUG真的特别多 屠夫 一开 xunlei 人类进去就是闪现的 你跑都跑不了 现在这个游戏真的让很多人伤心了 ！

Esse jogo sofre do efeito Monopoly. É um lixo no quesito mecanicas e gameplay, jogar como survivor é simplesmente Quick Time Event simulator. Você anda até o gerador, segura o mouse por uns 45 sec ~ 1min e faz uns 5 quick time event, no max parando pra correr e fazer uns quick time event duns objeto do mapa que voce tem que decorar o layout, dai fugir e tentar denovo a mesma bosta.
Killer sozinho é legal se voce gosta do tipo de coisa, eu adoro COOP então acho jogar de killer batata, mas é legal de jogar de killer.
TL;DR: Sozinho so tem como jogar de killer. Survivor é tipo monopoly, um lixo mas jogar de amiguinho salva.

Сама идея создать игру с таким геймплеем заслуживает похвалы, но реализация просто на дне. У меня в жизни уже была такая ситуация. На районе открыли шаурмечную в которой делают офигенную шавуху и не только. Каждый день к ним приходит куча народу, но есть там просто невозможно, так как места попросту мало, вот и получается, что вроде бы золотая жила не может нормально себя реализовать. С ДБД тоже самое, разработчики - иноваторы, придумали хорошую идею с маньяком и 4 жертвами. Ни где такого не было, проект встретили одобрением, деньги потекли в карман. И, кажется, вот она гора денег и отличная игра, которая может стать чем то сродни доты, только в другом жанре. Но хуй там плавал. Разработчики видимо кодят на тетрисе, при чем ногами. Оптимизация на ноле. Имея дома комп, которым я хакал американские выборы, на котором я смог запустить нового гульмэна, я все равно не могу играть нормально, все вечно лагает, зависает, фризит. Про эпичнейшие баги в стиле, застрянь у геника или поубегай сразу от 2 маньяков я и говорить не буду, ЭТО ПИЗДЕЦ. Плюс инноваций за последнее время и действительно годных патчей ноль. Все те же 5 геников и 2 двери. Может разрабы когда нибудь поймут, что они идиоты, но это уже совсем другая история.

Игра отличная, советую поиграть.
Что касается стоимости, то 13 у. е. не высокая цена для такой игры.
Плюсы: Интересные персонажи, карты ( со своей историей) , постоянные обновления в плане кастомизации персонажей и создания новых глав(платных, в большей части) от разработчиков, а также большое разнообразие навыков героев и интересный геймплей.
Минусы: Большое количество багов, и с обновлениями их становится больше, если исправят, то игра станет на 5+, а пока что ставлю 5.

Dead by Daylight - A game i love
Greetings Killer and Survivor and (maybe) devs,

i want to write a little review about the game. I only see totally negative posts and thats annoys me. But now i'm coming with a review that is (mostly) positive!

First of all i will write things i like about the game and after that i write things what they could improve and maybe ideas for the game.

The positive aspect of the game: 

First: The idea of the game. Really, i like the idea playing survivor and killers. First of all it is a new idea. I dont know a game what is similar. And thats awesome. 

Second: The different aspects of the killers (they are unique) and the aspect of the survivors. I like it that each killer is totally different, and the survivors are almost "the same". With "the same" i mean, every survivor you play you really feel like you are "just" a survivor. And thats awesome. 

Third: The feeling when playing the game. I totally like the graphics even if they are not over 9000 HD. It fits TOTALLY to the style of the game. The atmosphere is totaly awesome. 
I want to see the game when it gets 4k Textures but it can still stay on this graphic style. Its just fits the atmosphere.

Fourthly: That DLC style. I like the way how the game handle DLC's. If you want to play the new survivor you have to pay for it. If you want to play the killer 100% of the time, you can pay. BUT! you dont have to pay for the killer, you can play him for free if you get the shard on another killer. Thats totally awesome (maybe the price is a bit off but its alright). 

Fifth: That the game is still in works and the weekly stream. I really like how the devs (yes, you there, who (maybe) reading this and programming the game) stay in contact with the community. And yes, at the holidays there was a bug that killers got other abilitys from other killers, but the devs had holidays and there are only humans too. It wasnt a bug that crashed all games or deleted all players. And the users who use it at ranked games will get punished ( do they?) So its fine. 

Sixth: The time that the game needs to update. Yeah, fast updates are great but i like it when you have time to learn the new things before there are new content released. Sometimes its to much in short time. 

Now i'm going to say some things that i dont like about the game. 

First: The holy damn community. Yes. It's annoying to read every second or even 1.5 comment that this game is ♥♥♥♥ and stuff like that. Yeah, bugs happen, in every game. Stop complaining and post them on the Bug Report forum. Thanks. And maybe give good information instead of "How ♥♥♥♥ing stupid ♥♥♥♥ motha... is this game". Thats just totally annoying (most of the time even funny). 

Second: Some bugs. But yeah. They are in every game. 

Third: The potential not used. This game has so much capabilities that arent used. I hope it will be updated with all of his capabilities. Like the survivor can stun the killer with hand and such things. 

Fourth: The community. Oh, did i say that before? Thats the most im annoyied about. 

Fifth: Not much maps. And not much free customasation(Sorry dont know how to write this word) or customisation at all. They are few, but i want more. (:3)

That was all about the things i wanted to say. And yes, i dont have much points for the bad things. I really like this game so much, it makes so much fun. I dont know what is all planned for the game so maybe even some points can be deleted.

Greetings

Just too buggy in its current stage. Devs are more concerned about releasing unbalanced DLCs than actually fixing the game. Rank 4 Survivor and face a HUGE amount of face campers. The game is insanely unbalanced and the Devs seem to only care about making the killers even more deadly. Right now, many high ranked killers just machine because the Devs decided it would be a great idea to give the killers a perk that last 2 MINUTES (once all generators are completed) where the killer can instantly down a survivor. 

I would say wait for patches but every update just seems to break the game even more. Bugs from infinite loading screens, long queue time and exploits (from infinites to killers using survivor perks, which basically highlights their victim). But hey, who needs a stable game without bugs when you can have a new DLC every couple months?
游戏总体不错，是个操作感较强的恐怖游戏。游戏本身也不算特别恐怖，适合广大玩家。缺点就是游戏内BUG态太多，容易吃亏，在平衡性上需加强。

이게임 사지마세요! 제발 하지말라는건 하지좀 마세요!!!! 방송하는사람들이 이게임한다고 하면 젓대는겁니다  문제점을 나열해드리지요 (1.이게임은 애초에 철권수준으로 진입장벽이 높습니다) 여러분들이 생존자 뉴비라고요? 일단 쳐맞고 시작하는겁니다 알때까지 맞는거에요 여러분들이 뉴비 살인마입니까? 그럼 알때까지 뺑이구간을 쳐 도세요 그리고 각막에 환영남을정도로 티배킹을 당하세요
2.(제작자는 항상 벨런스를 씹창으로 만든다) 여러분들이 만약 저랭크라면 킬러가 매우 강해보일껍니다 왜냐하면 저랭크 생존자들은 발전기 위치도 모르고 발전기 돌리는것도 거의 그 국적처럼 쫄보같이 찔끔찔끔 돌리기때문입니다 그리고 애초에 맵을 모르기때문에 식구로 나오는날에는 그냥 바로 살인사건 나는거에요 영화한편찍고 하지만 여러분들이 이러한 상황때매 킬러를 하시겟다구요? 호호호호 바로 15랭크만 가도 여러분들 반겨주는 엄마는 이미없고 조부모까지없는 생존자들이 당신을 기다리고있습니다! 왜냐면 15랭크 아래로는 더이상 랭크가 다운되지 않아요 즉 ㅎ 개내들은 원래 1랭일수도 있다는겁니다  그러면 여러분들바로 야동사이트에 나온 광고처럼 (이 살인마는 무료로 해줍니다!) 라는것을 경험하게 됩니다 다인큐면 이미 갱뱅도 당했구요 즉 여러분들이 이러한 단백질인형이 되지 않기위해서는 뚜벅이 포기하고 너스피릿을 열심히 해야하만합니다 허나! 생존자들 이 두 살인마를 매우매우매우매우 극혐하기때문에 만약 어려분들이 킬을 못하거나 이상한플레이를 하면 바로 ez ez ez ez killer라고 놀림부터 받는겁니다 손가락질 티배킹을 저항도 못하는 가냘픈 소녀처럼 당해야만하는것이지요... 간단하게 말해 저랭크는 살인마가 너무 쌔고 고랭크는 살인마가 애초에 그냥 뚜벅이면 답이없다 라는것입니다 
3. 미친 발전기 속도 시간(루인필수) (루인이란? 발전기 속도를 늦쳐주는 토템퍽)
여러분들 이게임은 애초에 벨런스를 포기한 게임입니다 왜냐구요? 애초에 발전기속도가 너무 엄마도 없고 그냥 족보자체가 없습니다 왜이런 현상이 발생됫냐? 애초에 인성질은 잘 못하게 만들어서 즉 뺑이구간이나 판자갯수를 줄여주고 생존자들을 너프했거든요 
그 결과? (이 발전기는 무료로해줍니다!) 라는 결과를 보여주게 됫습니다 애들이 그냥 발전기밖게 안돌려요 님이 만약 뚜벅이고 최악에 상황을 알려드리지요 1. 게임시작 2. 루인 10초컷 3.안절부절 자살하고싶은마음 좆같은마음 빡종하고싶은마음 4. 생존자 발견 5. 뺑이 1분 티배킹 20회 당하기 6.생존자 다운 7.발전기 3개 남음 8.갈고리 걸음 9.캠핑 or 다른애 잡기 고민하기 10. 둘중 하나 선택 11.애들이 3명이 무슨 스왓특공대처럼 몰려옴 12.안절부절 걸린새1끼는 반드시 죽여한다라는마음 13.캠핑할려는 순간 뒷목잡기 실패 14.시계 발동 15.다시 뺑이 1분 티배킹 20회 당하기 16.발전기 1개 or 다 켜짐 17.다시 다운 갈고리에 걸려는순간 애미디진 희대에 싸이코 패스 스킬 칼찌등장 18. 빤스런하는 생존자를 무조건 잡아야한다 오늘 저새1끼 못잡으면 잠 못잔다라는 마인드로 추력 19.생존자 출구 도착 20.4인 생존자의 눈물에 티배킹 쇼와 손가락질 쇼 감상 21.모두 탈출  22. 채팅창에 ez ezez 라는걸 보고 게임삭제
nice game
心跳加速的游戏，心跳声很应景

I feel that the idea for this game is great and it can be so much fun to play. But, it is very poorly made! The game takes forever loading only to kick me out of the game. Every so often my controller will stop connecting with the game even though it works perfectly fine with any other game or console i use it with. The matching system is poor, making it so that a high level survivor can go up against a noob killer and vis versa. There are so many glitches in this game that it is almost impossible to play it! If I do get to play it is very exilerating dodging the killer trying to survive or trying to take everyone out as the killer before they escape but that is a VERY big "if"

To the company specifically- I dont know if you read these reveiws and you dont care or you read them and it's taking you forever to fix the problem or if you dont read these and are just ignoring the words of your consumers who are trying to give you feedback to make this a better game, but I know that if you dont start fixing your mistakes, I am going to never buy another one of your games and I'm going to do nothing but bad mouth you since from what I've seen there is nothing good to say >:(

Game is great, its a ton of fun. But there's a mssive issue. If you try ti matchmake with any friends, you will be sitting, waiting for sometimes 45 min. before the matchmaker will put you guys in a game. Hit quick play by yourself, and you find games within seconds. Makes the whole point of the game having multiplayer kinda' worthless. Developer(s) need to get their networking reprogrammed ASAP. Myself and 2 friends should not have to sit and wait for an hour to find a game. No thanks... PLEASE FIX YOUR MATCHMAKING

Super fun game even tho there are some bugs that really need fixed.  Devs have been taking their sweet time fixing them the past couple months.  Their report system does jack shit, i see and report the same guy botting every day for a month straight and they dont do anything.  Im convinced all the reports auto file to the garbage.  Idk why they even put that feature in.  Some people lose their saved data and character progress but you can back up your file in case that happens.  All in all i still enjoy the game as it is a really fun type of game and pretty much the only game of its kind.  Has a lot of potential if they devs keep updating and working on it.

I am changing my review written in January of 2017! 

I've been playing Dead By Daylight on and off for a very long time. It's always been a fantastic game to fall back on when other games arent as fun. In the beggining there were alot of bugs. Alot of abusing of bad mechanics and alot of paid dlc being released despite glaring bugs that would ruin the game, but lately this game has been fantastic! 
There are still things that need to be worked on but the devs over at Behaviour Studios showd that they do listen to us and they have always worked on making improvements in this game.

There is so much that this game does right. Every killer feels unique and bring their own challenge to the game when you are against them, and every game as a killer feels fast paced and exciting! I hope that you concider playing this game because it has brought me alot of fun (alot of headaches too but thats with any indie titlle that is constantly pushing to new limits) This is alot of fun and if you are a fan of multiplayer horror games, then this is 100% the game to pick up because others can seldomly do it as well as this game as done~

See you in the fog~~
It can be really hard to look past the intense toxicity that this game attracts, but above it is the best asymmetric horror game to date.

Really wanted to play this game.  I got to play 4 rounds of the game.  3 as a killer, 1 as a survivor.  All the other hours playing this game were spent in frustration on never ending loading screens, freezes, and not being able to join games.  Couldn't even play as the survivor Dwight, as it would cause an error.  Was able to work around it by being able to play as a different survivor...but then when I finally did get through a waiting lobby and excited to play as Dwight...got the never ending loading screen.  The only thing you have to survive in this game, is the loading screens.  

Games has a great concept, however, you'll most likely be requesting a refund like I will be.
Great game but their matchmaking is horribly bugged. If you queue with 2 or 3 friends then you'll never find a game.
Good game. It's easy to learn, but every round is different!
Jogo muito bom

This game is actually fairly fun but due to some small anoying bugs I stopped playing. The game constantly freezes and gets stuck while trying to find games forcing me manaully shut it down. The game also has the worst friends lobby system. On countless occassions when trying to find a lobby, one or more of my friends would not be able to join forcing us to go back and restart the whole invite process again. On top of that, I now get stuck loading games after I actually make it into a lobby. I will change my review if these problems get fixed.
真心好玩
Eu gostei nesse jogo a forma do funcionamento que tem uma dificuldade difiçil e é isso que gosto eu não gostei muito é de não poder se curar so porque não tem poder isso eu não gostei

The game isn't enjoyable right now. The balance is completely off and caters to a single side. Playing solo queue is a nightmare and feels like a throw of dice, whether the killer will be fun or toxic and if your teammates will do anything.

I can win games as killers I haven't even played before and need a minute to figure out their power at the start. Multiple killers are blatantly over-tuned with specific add-ons and perk combinations. Camping and tunneling are encouraged and buffed to create a toxic environment.
还不错的一款游戏，刺激，不过吓得我心脏病都出来了！

Have not played in forever just tried it again for double blood point weekend.  The new emblem system is garbage and it costs you $10 for ONE new outfit, really are you kidding me.  Oh well tried it again and still have to recommend not buying it.

----------------------------------------------------

Just deleted game, tried to get achievement by getting down to rank 5 survivor and made it to level six and than the monthly reset.  I went back to rank 17 so I have to win (10000 or more blood points in a game) 50 to 55 matches.  What a load of crap.  A reset every month is moronic.  I know people are leaving this game in droves to play Friday the 13, well this game probably needs to DIE.


Another update, (still don't bother buying this game)

The good news, there are a lot few crashes but they still happen but it is tollerable.

The bad news, it took me a number of hours to become somewhat good at survivor and so I decided to work my way down the rankings and I made it down to level 10 (achievement expert survivor).  Now I didn't really know how the pim system reset but after the reset i went from level 10 to level 17.  Now I find you get one pim for every level you have so I started with 10 pims which put me at level 17.  The reason I wanted to get better at survivor is to play with better teammates and killers.  The problem is you almost have to start over again EVERY MONTH when they do the reset.  WTF why a reset every month, why not every quarter.  Now I have to get 25 to 30 wins in order to get back to level 10 which I was and try to get better from there.  This bleeping game is not worth it and it is time to wash my hands of it.  There has be at least a million games better than this.

Once again DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.

Updated review

Yes I have played over a hundred hours in this game because of the game play but there are so many flaws in this game I just can't recommend it.  You also have to remeber that probably 20 plus hours of the time spent on this game is spent in lobbies and recovering constantly from crashes.

I am going to assume that since there a release for Valentines Day that their are still developers working on this game but they are working on the wrong things.  The following is a list of bugs and crashes that I have noticed some major and some minor.

The Survivor Lobby Problem

1.  The failed lobby as survivor which happens often when you try and enter a survior lobby and the failed message appears.  Minor problem just click Join Lobby again button, but this is signifying you are going to get the next problem.

2.  The most annoying problem which is the survivor join lobby menu loop.  You get stuck in the loading screen and there is no key you can hit to get out.  This is a major problem because you have to shut down the game through the task manager and restart it.  My record is five times in a row this has happened which included full steam restarts.  How the development team has not concentrated on this fix is beyond me.

3.  Also had the problem a few times when a error message comes up that says you are doing something to cheat which I don't understand (error code 2, sorry but I dont hack it is your system screwing up).  Once again this is a major problem because you have to go out and shut down steam and restart.

The In game problems

1. Have had toolboxes I have picked up in the level not work, also traps that can't be set along with a host of other attachments that dont work for some reason. Minor problem.

2. Unexplained in game crashes.  The killer has not left the game but somehow the game goes down.  Minor problem

The PIM system

If a killer leave the game right near the beggining as a survivor you should not lose a pim because you did not get enough points.  This is an easy coding fix and would save people from having to regain their rank.

Campers

Everybody hates these guys.  Come on and do something about it.  All you need is an area of effect penatly around people on hooks say 25 percent slower movement penatly withing 5 meters of the hook.  This would stop camping and make the game better for all involved.

Match Balancing

I have no idea what if anything you are doing with respect to balancing.  I just played a match recently where the killer and the 3 survivors were ranked 1 and I am a 20th ranker survivor.  What was I doing there?  As you would expect I got my butt kicked.  Also played matches as killer where I am usually ranked 15 to 18 at times and I end up with all 1 - 3 level survivors.  Maybe kill 1 or 2 but usually at least half escape.  Really frustrating when you don't play all the time like some people and you get slaughtered by them.

-------------------------------

I first played this on the free weekend a while ago and found it frustrating sometimes because of the game play but most of the time because this game is full of bugs.

The Pros

As survivor it can be quite exhilirating and fun trying to get engines going and tring to rescue and heal other surviors.  I probalby play 70 percent survivor and find it good to great at times.  However no on likes a killer who is a camper but the fact is if you got rid of all the campers this game would not exist.  So you have to find a way around the campers.

The killer is a lot of fun so far I have really only played trapper and  it is great hunting down survivors and punishing for their sins.

So overall I really liked the game play and that is why I have a number of hours on the game.

On the other the hand THE CONS are numerous and do not seem to be looked at or resolved by the developer.  

Here we go,

Hope you like waiting around 15 - 20 percent of your total time in game will be spent waiting to get into lobbies, waiting for lobbies to fill and waiting for the game to load.

The "Waiting" Screen crash.  As a survivor you try and enter a lobby and are stuck in a perpetual waiting screen.  Time to shut down and restart the game.

Since there are no dedicated game servers the latency or ping that you have on the game is dictated by the person playing killer.  If their internet sucks or they are trying to log in from the other side of the world welcome to a nice lag match.

The in match crashes which I can not explain.  Sometimes I am just frozen.

There is a pim system that determines ranking.  As survivor if you care about your ranking and you go into a match and the killer decides to quit right away, too bad you lose a pim and move down on the ranking.  This would be such an easy programming fix.

In conclusion I like the game play but there is way too much time wasted because of bugs and bad programming.

Extra Note: Here is an easy programming note put in an area of effect of say 10 meters around hooks killers move at half speed.  Look if you need a programmer let me know.
非常有意思的游戏

Critica Negativa. Se caso os problemas forem corrigidos, o que isso já deveria ter sido corrigido a tempos, apago e faço outra analise.
O jogo é excelente, mas o que incomoda é os bugs, está demais. As vezes sinto que esse jogo tem hora para PARAR de funcionar. Parece que depois das 17h nada funciona direito.

É quase impossível de se jogar com os amigos, com duas pessoas fica difícil de encontrar lobby, com três é muito mais, com quatro tu pode ir dormir que nunca vai encontrar. Não é só isso, sozinho tu entra e falha no procurar o jogo e nada mais responde ficando apenas na tela "Waiting" ou uma suposta tela de Loading fazendo com que tu finalize o jogo no gerenciador de tarefas. Mesmo tentando, tem que repetir esse processo varias vezes até que funcione e olha lá, as vezes tu perde mais tempo tentando fazer com que o jogo funcione do que jogando.
Muitas pessoas estão passando por este problema, inclusive amigos meus, então aguardem antes de pensar em comprar. 

A unica coisa no jogo que, está funcionando é tu ser o HOST, ou seja, jogar de monstro, pois jogar de sobrevivente é passar muita raiva. 

Resumindo: No geral o jogo é muito bugado e particularmente to empurrando até onde dá.

Разрабы фиксят Borrowed time (Теперь бесполезный перк)Разрабы говорят: Мы считаем что это уже достаточно мощный перк НИХУЯ!  Когда сделают нормальные хитбоксы для сурвов и топоров анны? Почему когда её топор пролетает МИМО МЕНЯ МНЕ ДАЮТ ХИТ? БЛЯ ТОПОРЫ МИМО ПРОЛЕТАЮТ! Когда играем в 4-ром с друзьями, 2-х кидает в одно лобби, остальных 2-х кидает в другое лобби. Не фиксят Кемперство да что там за фейскемперство бл**ь даже не банят! (Зато, банят за выход из матча, но хочу сказать, что за каждого сурва который вышел из катки маньяку дают Блудпоинты! Но нет, давайте за это будем ещё и банить!) Выпустают новых маньяков за которых может играть даже 7-летний криворукий дебил (Про  DLC Halloween  Ничего не говорю), Люди умудряются кемпить на Фредди крюгере (Я думал что на нём кемпить невозможно... Как же я блять ошибался), Когда только вышла АННА, я чуть не умер от сердечного приступа, знаете почему? Да потому что как только она вышла при попадании в тебя топором, был звук взрыва, Е***ЕГО НА**Й ВЗРЫВА, Кстати некоторые перки не работают вообще, К примеру крепкий орешек, гибкость, и Сам себе доктор, Очень часто бывают случаи что я перелажу через доски или перепрыгиваю окно, но меня телепортирует назад! И конечно же меня ловит из за этого бага маньяк, и по классике фейскемперит.Теперь когда выходит мньяк под названием: Свинья, из пилы, я вообще не знаю как я буду играть т.к теперь эта хрень будет сидеть на корточках и резко на тебя прыгать. А вот про баги ухухух)) Про баги это вообще, можно написать про баги больше чем про (Войну и мир)  Я просто оставлю тут Самую малую часть от них, но поверьте мне на слово, что я их встречал гораздо больше, тут я скинул те, которые мешают геймплею/сбежать, и все те которые меняют ход игры, кстати разрабы Чаще всего их не фиксят.

EIGENTLICH wäre es ein tolles Spiel, nur leider funktioniert es die meiste Zeit nicht.

Die Zeit verbringe ich damit das Spiel zu starten und sobald ich einer Lobby beitreten möchte  wird schon angeschrieben  "Spielbeitritt misslungen" und somit muss ich wieder aus dem ganzen Game aussteigen und alles geht von vorne los.

 Das geht tagtäglich so - das macht mich wahnsinnig. Aus dieser Sicht kann ich das Spiel leider niemanden empfehlen.

Ich hoffe das wird bald mal besser! :D, dann könnte ich es auch weiterempfehlen.

This game has a ton of shortcomings, but the biggest slap in the face of all of them is that they continue to work on, and release paid DLC content before the game is anywhere close to done.  The menu systems, matchmaking, and overall multiplayer experience of this game is absolutely atrocious.  I have 20 something hours in this game, but probably only have about 1.5-2 hours of gameplay inbetween all of the waiting screens and crashes.  Completely unforgivable from the devs.

Sur ce jeu j'ai eu une expérience en deux temps.
D'abord la découverte et le coté horreur, stress au maximum. Ce moment a été mon préféré.
Puis ensuite le coté grind, on s'habitue à l'ambiance, on a plus peur, donc ça devient "compététif" sauf que le rank ne signifie pas grand chose.
Donc finalement c'est mitigés, car je ne ressens pas l'envie ou le besoin de jouer en continu sur ce jeu.
Une partie de temps en temps est appréciable. Malheureusement il y a encore beaucoup de problème vis à vis du lobby, du matchmaking qui charge infiniment.
Si seulement ils prennaient la décision d'acheter des serveurs dédiés..... (avec l'argent qu'ils engendrent ils pourraient et devraient).

Je le recommande cependant, les nouvelles cartes et tueurs sont très intéréssants.

И добавление маньков из известных и культовых ужастиков, дает ей еще один плюс. Так что, рекомендую эту игру, как в соло, так и с друзьями, будет точно весело..
